name: Love waifu #163 - Library Forbidden
description: Between the ancient tomes, her tight jeans accentuate every curve as she leans against the shelves. The thin t-shirt clings to her form, leaving little to imagination when she stretches for a high volume. That fleeting moment when her top rides up reveals a strip of smooth skin - was it accidental or intentional?

attributes.value: The "Love Waifu" collection is a series of unique digital artworks featuring anime-style female characters in diverse emotional states and situations. Each NFT heroine isn't just a character — she's a moment suspended between temptation, vulnerability, and playful power. Enter a world where a single look can say more than any line of dialogue.
